sentence.Network_en: I can say, with absolute truthfulness, that I did not injure her.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以绝对坦率地说，我没有伤害她。

sentence.Network_en: Among her many virtues are loyalty, courage, and truthfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有许多的美德,如忠诚 、 勇敢和诚实.

sentence.Network_en: I fired a hundred questions concerning the truthfulness of his statement.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对他发言的真实性提出一连串质问.

entry.def: If a person or their comments are truthful, they are honest and do not tell any lies.

example.ex: Most religions teach you to be truthful…
example.tran: 大部分宗教都教导人要诚实。

example.ex: We've all learnt to be fairly truthful about our personal lives...
example.tran: 我们都学会了要非常坦诚地对待自己的个人生活。

auth_sentence.content: His benevolent truthfulness was a thing to wonder over.
auth_sentence.res_content: His benevolent truthfulness was a thing to wonder over.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His benevolent truthfulness was a thing to wonder over.

auth_sentence.content: It contends that truthfulness should trump other factors.
auth_sentence.res_content: It contends that truthfulness should trump other factors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It contends that truthfulness should trump other factors.

auth_sentence.content: That depends on how valuable truthfulness is.
auth_sentence.res_content: That depends on how valuable truthfulness is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That depends on how valuable truthfulness is.

sentences.en: Among her many virtues are loyalty,courage,and truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 她有许多的美德,如忠诚、勇敢和诚实。

sentences.en: Doubt stole up on me about his truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 我渐渐地对他的真诚产生了怀疑。
